    9 minute read

    Published: September 06, 2024

    Yes this is another post about the grad school application process. I just went through this process and I am giving advice to a bunch of friends and thought I should write it down in one place.

    research

    Habitable Zone Boundaries for Circumbinary Planets

    Published: November 23, 2019

    We used a climate model to understand the habitable zone of circumbinary planets

    Wolf Cukier et al 2019 PASP 131 124402

    https://arxiv.org/pdf/1911.02983.pdf

    TOI-1338: TESS’ First Transiting Circumbinary Planet

    Published: May 07, 2020

    This paper describes the discovery of the circumbinary planet TOI-1338b.

    Veselin B. Kostov et al 2020 AJ 159 253

    https://iopscience.iop.org/article/10.3847/1538-3881/ab8a48/pdf

    Natural Transport of Microbes from Early Venus to an Archean Earth.

    Published: May 01, 2022

    My Spring JP

    Polarized Raytracing of Black Hole Magnetospheres

    Published: January 01, 2023

    My Fall JP

    ABM-2: An improved Absolute Beam Monitor

    Published: May 12, 2023

    This project was completed in the year long laboratory class AST250/251

    Formation, Structure, and Detectability of the Geminids Meteoroid Stream.

    Published: June 15, 2023

    We present three posible formation models for the Geminids and compare PSP data, along with data at Earth

    W. Z. Cukier and J. R. Szalay 2023 Planet. Sci. J. 4 109

    https://doi.org/10.3847/PSJ/acd538
